name: Q*Bugs
description:
Q*Bugs

You are an electron who wants to achieve his mission in this computer.

You have to reach the CPU.

But on your way, there is bugs. you have to avoid them, if not nothing is going to be normal anymore. And you will not be able to thrust the developpers.

Keep your two eyes open (is an electron has eyes?)

It's going to be fast!

Be careful the worst one "Fatal exception"... and Game Over

Keyboard: ADWS / QDZS

GamePad: Left Stick

Give your Username for the online LeaderBoard, so you can compare yourself with all the other players. Who is going the be the number one!
